name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flywheel Chargebacker - Amazon automated claims tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use intelligent algorithms to help sellers find claimable assets on Amazon and automate profit recovery.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We analyze the shipments, orders, and inventory of each product, calculating whether it should open claim cases or not.
Sellers just need to enable the plugin under their Amazon seller center stores and marketplaces. Our plugin will automatically submit the claim case for the seller, and identify the feedback mechanism of Amazon case to ensure the validity of the claim.
Note:
1.It takes about 6hrs to sync the data at the first time, then you just need to check the inventory status bi-weekly. If there is no data, it means that your inventory is under great management.
2.To avoid the possibility of duplicate case opening on Amazon, we strongly suggest using only one claim tool.
